Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.beans

Class WarehouseBean

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.beans.WarehouseBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer, PlayerBean
public class WarehouseBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer, PlayerBean
Class used to serialize a Warehouse object, send it over the network and store its information in the client

    Getter for the size of each depot
